ygData.subject: Re: Combat skills for mages
ygData.msgSnippet: nope, nothing is wrong. combat skills dont rise as much as non combat and spell casting skills do. (and i do believe warriors and monks combat skills rise
ygData.messageBody:
nope, nothing is wrong. combat skills dont rise as much as non combat and
spell casting skills do. (and i do believe warriors' and monks' combat
skills rise faster than spellcasters, but i am not 100% on that).

Qorona of the Volition Guild, 15th lvl (or 16th depending on the time of
day, hehe) enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 07:24 PM 4/29/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Jonathan Bro <im_mortal_1@...>
>
>Ok, i have this big problem...I am a level 11 enchanter and my offense
>and defense skills arent even at (40) yet! (the cap is 60). I fight
>alot...with my staff...and still the skill just about never ever goes
>up. For example the offense, defense skill went up 1 number the whole
>time i was level 10.
>
>something has to be wrong!

-------------------
tim borrelli
computer character animator and crackhead extraordinaire
Volition, Inc.
